quote: I feel free and strong. If I were not a reader of books I could not feel this way. Whatever may happen to me, thank God that I can read, that I have truly touched the minds of other men.
quote_letters: I FEEL FREE AND STRONG IF I WERE NOT A READER OF BOOKS I COULD NOT FEEL THIS WAY WHATEVER MAY HAPPEN TO ME THANK GOD THAT I CAN READ THAT I HAVE TRULY TOUCHED THE MINDS OF OTHER MEN
